org.hps.recon.utils

Interface TrackClusterMatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTrackClusterMatcher, TrackClusterMatcherMinDistance, TrackClusterMatcherNSigma

    public interface TrackClusterMatcher
    This is an interface for creating TrackClusterMatcher algorithms used in reconstruction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyClusterCorrections(boolean useTrackPositionClusterCorrection, List<Cluster> clusters, double beamEnergy, HPSEcal3 ecal, boolean isMC)
      If set to true in steering-file, apply cluster corrections before matching Tracs to Clusters.
      void enablePlots(boolean enablePlots) 
      double getMatchQC(Cluster cluster, ReconstructedParticle particle)
      Return match quality of Track+Cluster pair
      void initializeParameterization(String fname)
      Pass generic parameterization file to matcher
      HashMap<Track,Cluster> matchTracksToClusters(EventHeader event, List<List<Track>> trackCollections, List<Cluster> clusters, StandardCuts cuts, int flipSign, boolean useCorrectedClusterPositionsForMatching, boolean isMC, HPSEcal3 ecal, double beamEnergy)
      Return a map of Tracks with matched Clusters.
      void saveHistograms()

      Set beam energy
      void setBFieldMap(FieldMap bFieldMap)

    • Method Detail

      • matchTracksToClusters

        HashMap<Track,Cluster> matchTracksToClusters(EventHeader event,
                                             List<List<Track>> trackCollections,
                                             List<Cluster> clusters,
                                             StandardCuts cuts,
                                             int flipSign,
                                             boolean useCorrectedClusterPositionsForMatching,
                                             boolean isMC,
                                             HPSEcal3 ecal,
                                             double beamEnergy)
        Return a map of Tracks with matched Clusters. Tracks may be returned with null Cluster match.

      • applyClusterCorrections

                             List<Cluster> clusters,
                             double beamEnergy,
                             HPSEcal3 ecal,
                             boolean isMC)
        If set to true in steering-file, apply cluster corrections before matching Tracs to Clusters.
